text:
when i installed apache 2.0.50 it didnt install the apache service i looked in
the online doc on how to manualy install it and i get this error mesage
i typed this :[ D:\Program Files\Apache Group\Apache2\bin>apache -k install  ]

it gave me this:[
(OS 10048)Only one usage of each socket address (protocol/network address/port)
is normally permitted.  : make_sock: could not bind to address    0.0.0.0:80
no listening sockets available, shutting down
Unable to open logs
]

this is the install log its the only log i found:[
Installing Apache HTTP 2.0 server with
 DomainName =  
 ServerName =  
 ServerAdmin = 
 ServerPort =  80
 ServerRoot =  D:/Program Files/Apache Group/Apache2
Rewrote D:/Program Files/Apache Group/Apache2/conf/httpd-win.conf
 to D:/Program Files/Apache Group/Apache2/conf/httpd.default.conf
Successfully removed D:\Program Files\Apache Group\Apache2\conf\httpd-win.conf
Existing file D:/Program Files/Apache Group/Apache2/conf/httpd.conf preserved
Duplicated D:/Program Files/Apache Group/Apache2/conf/ssl.default.conf
 to D:/Program Files/Apache Group/Apache2/conf/ssl.conf
Existing file D:/Program Files/Apache Group/Apache2/conf/magic preserved
Existing file D:/Program Files/Apache Group/Apache2/conf/mime.types preserved
Successfully removed D:\Program Files\Apache Group\Apache2\conf\InstallConf.awk
]

i am running windows xp pro service pack 1 i tryed disabling norton antivirus
2004 and it didint help

if you need a list of the servicees runing on my pc  or anyother info email me
at padamsn@netscape.net
creator: padamsn@netscape.net
chip@force-elite.com
text: make sure you do not have IIS or another webserver running.
